descriptionHtml:
An expansion to the wonderful Invested Magic mod by NineInchNall. 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11397]Make sure to grab it over here.[/url]

This mod modifies the three Cairn summons to use the Invested Magic system. 
Should be combatable with any mods as long as they dont modify the Summon Boneman, Mistman, or Wrathman spells. 
This mod should only be used with the base Invested Magic mod. This mod should be placed lower than NineInchNall\'s mod on the load order. I will not be held responsible for any glitches that happen if these two steps are not followed. 

Special thanks to NineInchNall for all the help when making this mod.

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125882642] Also Available on the Workshop[/url]
author: FenixPhlame
